mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMESLOT( start_time, end_time, delivery_date, count, cutoff ) VALUES( #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{deliveryDate}, #{count}, #{cutoff} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TIMESLOT SET start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime} WHERE timeslot_id=#{timeslotID}
mapper.select: SELECT delivery_date deliveryDate FROM TIMESLOT WHERE delivery_date>#{searchInitDate} GROUP BY deliveryDate LIMIT #{validDays}

SELECT delivery_date deliveryDate FROM TIMESLOT WHERE delivery_date>=#{searchInitDate} AND delivery_date<date_add(#{searchFinishDate}, interval 1 day) GROUP BY delivery_date ORDER BY delivery_date ASC
SELECT timeslot_id timeslotID, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, delivery_date deliveryDate, count, cutoff FROM TIMESLOT WHERE delivery_date=#{deliveryDate}
